lenders.name: William

lenders.occupational_info: I'm supporting companies in change management

lenders.name: Mos

In memory of my Grandmother whose generosity of spirit and unflinching love for me continues to inspire me to this day. Most of my loans will reflect my gratitude to her.

And, I am from the developing part of the world, know what poverty is, and am only giving a lil' back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to develop infrastructure projects

lenders.name: Torbjørn
lenders.loan_because: simply just because I have been fortunate enough to be blessed with good health and jobs that makes it possible for me to share some of my earnings.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a dj at a night club during the weekends. Weekdays I manage 2 shoe stores in my hometown - Harstad - which is located in the North of Norway.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an IT Manager within oil and gas around the world. Aged 30 and live in Dubai.

lenders.name: Jan

lenders.name: Kåre
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing!

lenders.name: Reginald
lenders.loan_because: This method of helping someone is giving someone a hand up, not a hand out.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people's motivation to get somewhere can be one driving force for a better future for all.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because:
This is a great way to help other people across the world. If we all help a little, big changes can be made.

I have faith in Kiva and respect for this organisation who have made it possible for me to see exactly where my money is beeing used to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer care and sales contact.

lenders.name: Jørgen Foss
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to be born in a wealthy country, while others were less fortunate. I feel it is my obligation to help those people in whatever way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a computer engineer, while I work at a petrol station to earn a little extra money.

lenders.name: Asbjørn S
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people!

lenders.name: Heidi Elise
lenders.occupation: manager of a small popular culture arena.
lenders.loan_because: I'm far from rich, but I know that I am better off than many. With my small contributions given directly to lenders, I hope to help others achieve more stability in income and security in their businesses :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I am the manager of a small student based association that arranges music conserts and other student happenings.

lenders.name: Asbjørn
lenders.loan_because: it will enable people to help themselves

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: ...I don't know why...I can't even afford it hehe.
lenders.occupational_info: I get paid too much so that I can buy food that also costs too much.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I advice housing cooperatives on economy and administration.

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: No one can help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  doctor, currently specializing in psychiatry.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: People reaching their potential is my passion.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students, helping them to learn and grown beyond the classroom.

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: I think it's great to help all these people out.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: there is a need and I have a means
lenders.occupational_info: I help train leaders in Asia to be God's hands in Asia

lenders.name: Pearl
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this program.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I assist Amerasian people, whose mother is Vietnamese and their father is American.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world around me. I want everyone to succeed in life. If I can be a part of that, I consider it an honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I create print and online marketing material for a financial software company.

lenders.name: BARBARA
lenders.loan_because: FEW DOLLARS WILL NOT MAKE ME POORER BUT IT MAY CHANGE SOMEONE ELSE'S LIFE. SOMETIMES A LITTLE HELP IS ALL WE NEED...

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: together working collectively the economic inequalities in the world can be solved.  A little bit of change can make big changes.  My actions are to be the change I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an academic researcher, mother, and Kiva Fellow (KF9).

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: success is a mixture of good luck and work ethic. You have the work ethic, and I want to give you some of my luck.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying "Global Health" in Washington, D.C. I work with local organizations to raise health conditions of people living in poverty around the world, and hope to be a doctor.

lenders.name: Dirksens
lenders.loan_because: We want to participate in the growth of a family in another part of the world. We think that is a privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: We are part of a church in Canada . I (dad) sometimes teach at a seminary in Canada and in India.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe that Kiva is giving a hand up, not a hand out. I believe in their ministry and hope that it changes the lives of millions of people, one at a time.  I want to be one of those who helps.  God has blessed me to be a blessing to others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the lead pastor for a lutheran church in Michigan. We have about 250 at worship every Sunday.

lenders.name: Mike and Lori
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us to be a blessing! Our children are learning  the joy of giving.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I believe in human effort and that all of us can win in live if we try

lenders.name: Robin & Steve
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I need, and I'd rather share than accumulate more.
lenders.occupational_info: When a project needs to get done, I help to organize everything to get it accomplished.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: it is a way that I can afford to help alleviate global poverty one person at a time.  It is what Christ called us to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children in a church preschool

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I desire to be a blessing, however small, to others.  Matt. 5:42

lenders.name: Dana and John
lenders.loan_because: We loaned this money because the love of God.  We want others across the world to have nice homes.  My son picked you out of all the  people on the pages and wants your children, to have a nice house.  My son is 5 years old.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for sells office furniture

lenders.name: Scott and Becky
lenders.loan_because: We love to see others succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: Becky teaches elementary school and Scott is a professional counselor.

lenders.name: Gene
lenders.loan_because: My Rescuer and Leader calls upon His followers to give in His name to others.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: To be the hands and feet of Jesus.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: God is awesome, and I want everyone to know that.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the privilege of helping students become better readers, which I greatly enjoy.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: this is one of the greatest ways to impact/develop a community....teach someone to fish!
lenders.occupational_info: Director of missions and outreach

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: it empowers others to use the gifts God has given them to create a real future.
lenders.occupational_info: Walking alongside youth as they transition to self-sufficiency.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ's love compels me!

lenders.name: Lorenzo
lenders.loan_because: Helping people is when I feel the closest to God.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an internet company.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I can. (Thanks Kiva!)
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a full time web site designer/developer and also have a small web design business on the side.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: the interest on my investment is a life, not a percentage.
lenders.occupational_info: I am one of the pastors on staff at a wonderful church in North Carolina.

lenders.name: TheBrownFamily
lenders.loan_because: We think everyone should have the opportunity to hope in their future.
lenders.occupational_info: We're Christian missionaries to the United States.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I am able to lend and the borrowers need loans to work and make their lives better - Lending this way makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with banks and lending in the USA.
I'd really rather be lending in developing countries, so that is what I am doing in this small way.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals succeed so as to be able to be self supporting and give their families the security of shelter and food
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the gospel of Jesus Christ and help those who need counsel to help them get back onto a path that will help them discover their full potential through Christ.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Believe in the Christian ideal of helping others.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to begin being a part of assisting people with the vision, desire, and courage to make their own way.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist low-income individuals in learning job readiness skills and then helping them become employed and self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I love to invest in others so they can provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to have a personal and intimate relationship with God.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ calls us to love our neighbors.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to make things more efficient and to solve problems in a manufacturing facility.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I attended the Leadership Conference hosted by Willow Creek Church in Chicago (Bill HYbels).  One of the speakers told about this organization.  I felt compelled to do this to help people who need so little when I have so much in comparision.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a community college.   I teach mostly women who are usually single parents and are displaced workers due to the poor economy. Some of my students are also trying to improve their financial situations for their families like so many of these that I read about who need loans.

lenders.name: Maribeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to reach out and offer help to others around the world. I am enriched through these connections.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in a busy Healthcare clinic

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity to help underwrite and fund a loan for someone who has a need somewhere in the world is a privilege.  It is inspiring to have a name, face and bio of another person to connect with.

lenders.name: ajeng
lenders.loan_because: I have to run my clothing sale store
lenders.occupational_info: I  distribute clothes to some stores and also sale it door to door

lenders.name: Randy and Liza
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe that helping others help themselves is one of the highest forms of compassion.  We were blessed with funding when we started our business, it is time to pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: Randy is the CEO of a technology company that makes education software for Elementary and Secondary schools.  The product is distributed worldwide.

lenders.name: kevin
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me.  I want to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair and remodel houses, and I produce videos which document and communicate what God is doing through people in the church.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I believe in others and their ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: Recruit, train, maintian and sustain adult mentors for one-on-one relationships with at-risk youth.

lenders.name: aeiriuhnn
lenders.loan_because: I have been loaned to.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this company and this way of lending - not "giving."  I appreciate people working for what they dream of.  From that work comes pride and success.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work construction doing mostly electrical work, but I tend to dabble in all aspects including carpentry, HVAC, and plumbing.  I am enrolled in an online college studying to achieve my Bachelors Degree in Psychology.

lenders.name: Dave and Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world. Everybody needs a chance to realize their dreams. This is too easy not to be involved in .

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to try and make a difference globally, even in a small way, Kiva has given me this chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Difficult  at times but so rewarding. My students are amazing!

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for the opportunities I have living in Canada and I want to provide opportunities for others. Everyone with the determination to be an entrepreneur should have the resources they need to make it happen.
lenders.occupational_info: My company helps internet businesses improve their websites so they attract more customers.

lenders.name: Mowreader Family
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate people who are trying to provide for themselves and we want to provide resources for those people to become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a online retail company providing money to fund investments in growing the company. My wife is a children's pastor at a local church

lenders.name: Anthony McLean
lenders.loan_because: I heard about Kiva at this amazing conference called The Leadership Summit (http://www.willowcreek.com/events/leadership/2009/) I was blown away by the simple ingenuity of it all. I signed up as soon as I got home from the conference!

lenders.name: Duane Cook
lenders.loan_because: it helps people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies become competitive by electronically connection with each other through websites, EDI, exchanges, etc.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to make a difference in the life of another human being, however small it may be.

lenders.name: Tyrone
lenders.occupational_info: I preach and teach about the love of God and the gift of salvation through Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a way to support their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a youth pastor to junior and senior kids at our church.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I am a Christian.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with ex-felons in the United States.

lenders.name: Cary
lenders.loan_because: I believe that generosity is a blessing. I am blessed by the generosity of others. So, I want to be that blessing too.

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor, professor, traveler

lenders.name: Nicole

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me, I want to bless others.

lenders.name: Rusty

lenders.name: Desiree
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kenyon
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to my family and I, and I was greatly moved by Jessica Jackley's presentation at the Leadership Summit.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach drumming and music to college students in the United States (and part of my expertise is in "World Music" from places like Ghana, Brazil, Trinidad, etc!)

lenders.name: Sonnygll
lenders.loan_because: I care about about people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I troubleshoot, repair and maintain enterprise class servers running Unix or Linux. It's a technical, computer related sort of job.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Christ has blessed me with enough to meet my needs, and I want to help others experience the blessings of shared resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of making music to glorify God and to bring enjoyment to others.  I am studying to be a college professor of Music Theory.

lenders.name: Evelyn

lenders.occupational_info:
I am the manager of a small ward in Nuclear Medicine. 
We treat patients using Radioisotopes

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I beleive God wants us to end poverty

lenders.name: Joe & Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I want to inspire hope and confidence in others.

lenders.name: Brent and Nicole
lenders.loan_because: People need help.  God has given us opportunities, we just want people to have the same chance.

lenders.name: Mitch & Daphne
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I appraise damage to automobiles after they've been involved in an accident.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a positive impact in the lives of others who are simply hoping to improve their lives through honest work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the telecommunications industry

lenders.name: Dan and Gail
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help others.

lenders.name: Bartholomew
lenders.occupation: Helping my human play with computers.
lenders.loan_because: My world is quite small, but through Kiva, I can help others everywhere live better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My human is an accountant & volunteer.  She enjoys beading, reading, gardening. & playing with me & my sisters Tabitha & Gypsy.

lenders.name: Rochelle
lenders.loan_because: We are no longer an isolated economy. The global economy is the reality. To help others is my mission.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist our older adults get the servies they need to live full lives.

lenders.name: jose luis
lenders.loan_because: Poder Ayudar a los que mas lo Necesitan
lenders.occupational_info: Soy agente de viajes

lenders.name: Leif T Aanensen
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing is a great way to help people with good business ideas. If you have the capital to spare, it's just nice to put it into the value creation in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the public sector with privacy issues.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I found this concept intriguing.  I want to help, but can't do much.  This was achievable for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Adecco is the world's largest employment firm and helps people find jobs or change careers.  My role is to find companies to hire the people we represent.

lenders.name: Sevan
lenders.loan_because: I am seeking harmony all around the world

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I like to share and give a hand to everyone who's in need.
lenders.occupational_info: administration @  logistics/import agent in Rotterdam the mainport of Europe.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I have in the past needed just small amounts of money to make a difference to my life so I can relate to how a small loan can really assist someone to go on to achieve what they want in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a health service, managing and providing information training and support to clinical and non-clinical employees.

lenders.name: greg
lenders.loan_because: we all have been so blessed and it so good to see how we can share this  with others

lenders.name: Nic Osterberg
lenders.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I build the basic infrastructure that delivers electricity to homes and businesses in the United States.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: Even though I have very little myself, I enjoy being able to impact lives over and over again with the same $25! A little goes a long way! And every now and then, when I have a little more, I add it and help more people.  I've been blessed to be a blessing, so how can I not help others?
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of an organization (Wycliffe Bible Translators) that helps translate the Bible into the heart languages of the minority people groups of the world.  There are still 2400 language groups without God's Word, mainly because there aren't enough people to do the job, so I'm working as a recruiter, inviting people to join in the transformational work God is doing around the world through Bible translation!

lenders.name: Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: All of us need help from time to time and I believe Kiva's approach alleviates poverty with dignity while providing hope for the future...all of our futures.
lenders.occupational_info: I process payroll for nearly 400 people. The company I work for is ethical and a great place to spend 40 hours a week.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: We should help each other. I may need help one day too.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to make things with my hands and mind.

lenders.name: John & Lois
lenders.loan_because: It is just so good to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I sharpen scissors for people in beauty salons and all over the U.S.

lenders.name: Alan and Elle
lenders.loan_because: Loaning through Kiva is a fantastic way to just give people a break... It's sustainable - and in real terms costs us nothing or very little to be able to offer real help, to real people, to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Web design and Internet marketing.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: it's an incredibly easy way to give people the chance that they deserve.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer.  I design bridges on the highway system.

lenders.name: Wes
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Jeffray & Abby
lenders.loan_because: We need to fund innovation for a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make healthcare safe, high quality and affordable.   We help people make better health choices and coach all involved in healthcare to get better outcomes.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because it's what Jesus teaches every human being to do — love God and love your neighbours. It's the most humanly thing to engage in.
lenders.occupational_info: Pastor, communicator

lenders.name: Debbi
lenders.loan_because: It matters.
lenders.occupational_info: Interested in improving lives by caring for the whole person.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a proven method for helping people change their circumstances in a prudent and sustainable way. Kiva is a well-organized and reputable organization helping to close a gap that I would not be able to close on my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide management and technical services to companies that need help in specific areas of information technology. (Basically, I work with computers and the people who use them.)

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help someone who's smart and hard working realize his or her dream

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make an impact in the war against poverty and injustice
lenders.occupational_info: I help people across the globe to implement and follow processes that will improve the business

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We all need a start or restart in life, usually when we are most vulnerable. If a loan can make this happen and I can be part of a system that doesn't exploit 'vulnerability' then I am proud and happy to loan and enthusiastic to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teachers and educate others about 'planet friendly' technologies

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: It is a joy, and privilege to share and to benefit others.
lenders.occupational_info: providing spiritual and emotional care to patients and their families

lenders.name: Felix
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I feel a calling to help those around the world. To assist men and women to support their families by the hard work that they do. Microlending is that avenue, together we can help those that no lending institution could. Its not about investing for a financial return, its about investing in lives, in people!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company that provides medical insurance for low income families.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I was born on a very fortunate end of the spectrum
lenders.occupational_info: Our company cleans up hazardous waste spills

lenders.name: Blake and Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone succeed!

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Corynn
lenders.loan_because: We are all human.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs to  develop their business because I think that's the best way to do it and to be involved.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I love humans and want to share what I can with those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to help others improve the quality of their life

lenders.name: Joe Cat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs have a chance to succeed in business and in life.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: My teenage son and I learned about KIVA at The Leadership Summit, and decided to get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: My son is a very bright student who is a geography bee winner and I am an entrepreneur selling electronic components. We live in Florida.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: it is a privilege to be part of a world wide community and to share the blessings God has given our family
lenders.occupational_info: I work with selling flowering plants to people in the US and Canada.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: it is a pathway to economic viability with persons in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Economic visionary

lenders.name: Alycia
lenders.loan_because: I love enabling people to use their gifts and talents to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help lawyers and professionals re-think how they build relationships so they can sell, lead and grow their businesses better.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I would like to provide someone with the same opportunities that have been provided to me.  Their efforts are inspiring!

lenders.name: Doug & Maria
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said he cared about those who were in need, and he told his followers to as well, so here we are!

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I think Micro-Finance should be one of the corner-stones in a new sustainable development framework.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm part of a team that audits the financial statements of corporations.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I love people and want to help do may part to end world hunger.  I have also been to a bank and been told no to a loan that I truly needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I pastor a Christian and Missionary Alliance Church in Battle Lake, MN.

lenders.name: Elinor
lenders.loan_because: To celebrate the dignity, respect and admiration I have for entrepreneurial spirit aimed mainly at women who have children.
lenders.occupational_info: I coach teach and direct performers in interpreting and presenting songs on the stage. I am a deaconess at my Church through which we offer mercy, care, spiritual encouragement and financial helps to those in our Church who find themselves in dire circumstances.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe in you. You are worth the risk.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen carefully to people and I pay special attention to their hopes and concerns about their relationships, including but not limited to their relationship with God. Then I try to communicate from my experience and heart in ways that support them in their journey.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people because so many people have helped me. I pray that the money I loan will bless the receiver in many ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a commercial real estate developer.

lenders.name: Fran
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to have so much and want to give back and help those with initiative and a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I write lessons to teach people in businesses in the United States things they need know in order to do their jobs better (i.e. how to use a computer system)

lenders.name: Russel
lenders.loan_because: I've been helped out by many people over the years in getting my studio business going. I want to help others get their dreams off of the ground.
lenders.occupational_info: I work full time at a church making sure that our church services are the best that they can be. When I'm not doing that I've got a side business helping people record music.

lenders.name: Myles Arwine
lenders.loan_because: I being an entrepreneur myself know how great it feels to be given a chance to do something you really love and truly believe in. It's never a good feeling being turned down.
lenders.occupational_info: The work I do  is allowing organizations, everyday people, charities, companies, etc... communicate and connect to help stop poverty, hunger, HIV/AIDS, death, and many other problems throughout the world. I run Equal Works which is a networking/community website that allows people to view charity updates, get information on events, and also get help connect services with services.

lenders.loan_because: I have resources to share with others

How much more exciting does it get than that?! What a privilege and an honor!

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Shalom & Ria
lenders.loan_because:
I love effectiveness and efficiency. The fact that little amounts of money could change lives directly really intrigues me. The concept of no amounts too small to help someone is amazing! Also knowing that what you are giving is not just temporary solution, but a lifechanging one is really cool. 

Always loved the quote "Give a Man a Fish, Feed Him For a Day. Teach a Man to Fish, Feed Him For a Lifetime"

There is a sense of accountability in what we are offering... I love that!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in many small businesses office. Typically helping and being an apprentice/understudy to a successful entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Joy and Michael
lenders.loan_because: I (Michael) saw a presentation given by the founder at a Leadership conference, and I got excited about this idea and the impact it can have.  And I (Joy) heard about Kiva through a fund development class I took.  Love the idea of giving directly to people/entrepeneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: Michael is an actor and songwriter and playwright.  Joy is a theater director and teacher.

lenders.name: Chelsea
lenders.loan_because: no matter how small the effort, the ability to help can make a difference.

lenders.name: Linaka
lenders.loan_because: We are all one. For much of our shared human history, money has been a barrier between people, families, communities and countries and for far too long.  With Kiva, we can use the energy of money appropriately ... to bring us together.
lenders.occupational_info: Many in the modern world are lost with no one to talk with, no one to help.  Counseling is a way of talking and playing and working with the lost so they come back to themselves, find their strength and courage, and make their lives work with Joy.

lenders.name: Bernard
lenders.loan_because: The concept is great!

lenders.name: Andrea and Tielman
lenders.loan_because:
Matthew 25:40    " 31"When the Son of Man comes in his glory, and all the angels with him, he will sit on his throne in heavenly glory. 32All the nations will be gathered before him, and he will separate the people one from another as a shepherd separates the sheep from the goats. 33He will put the sheep on his right and the goats on his left. 
 34"Then the King will say to those on his right, 'Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world. 35For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, 36I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.' 

 37"Then the righteous will answer him, 'Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? 38When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? 39When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?' 

 40"The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' 

 41"Then he will say to those on his left, 'Depart from me, you who are cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels. 42For I was hungry and you gave me nothing to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me nothing to drink, 43I was a stranger and you did not invite me in, I needed clothes and you did not clothe me, I was sick and in prison and you did not look after me.' 


My thoughts:  I haven't chosen to give loans because I want to get into heaven, that's not what I am saying, because I believe that Jesus told the truth when he said that we are "saved by grace through faith, and not by works."   But, if it is important to God to take care of my neighbor, it is important to me.  Besides, I think he's hardwired it in me.   I have noticed that most every person I know has had success because someone, somehow, helped them achieve it.  I had no control over being born into a family who had the chance to succeed.  (and success is always relative and defined differently)...  but I understand the desire to create and to have a sense of accomplishment. I think everyone should have a chance to experience that.  I pray that God would bless the entire world through the partners of KIVA.  I pray also more specifically for entrepraneurs who struggle daily to educate their kids and feed their families.  God bless you.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I draw goofy cartoon portraits of people that visit las vegas.   :) Its fun!

lenders.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked."  Luke 12:48

The insurance is there to help you pay for any repairs that are needed so you don't lose your car and can't afford to repair it.  I inspect the damaged cars and pay for the repairs.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because:
Jesus said, "Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also." (Matthew 6:19-21)

AND

"Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me. Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink? When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee? Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee? And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me." (Matthew 25:34-40)
